text: [INST] Write an Opta-style tweet about the following: Julien De Sart is de onbetwiste leider van @KAAGent sinds zijn debuut in de @ProLeagueBE in juli 2021. Hij leidt in verschillende statistieken: gespeelde minuten (8.295), intercepties (202), gewonnen tackles (199) en balverovering (778).[/INST]8,295 - Julien De Sart among all @KAAGent players since making his @ProLeagueBE debut in July 2021: 🥇 Minutes played (8,295) 🥇 Interceptions (202) 🥇 Tackles won (199) 🥇 Possession won (778) Leader.

[INST] Write an Opta-style tweet about the following: Steven Bergwijn van @AFCAjax leverde een indrukwekkende prestatie in de eerste helft tegen Jagiellonia. Hij domineerde op meerdere fronten: hij creëerde de meeste kansen (3), had de hoogste Expected Goals (0.39 xG), de meeste balcontacten in het strafschopgebied van de tegenstander (8) en de meeste succesvolle dribbels (3). Bergwijn's veelzijdige display onderstreept zijn waarde voor het team.[/INST]3 - In the first half against Jagiellonia, @AFCAjax' Steven Bergwijn was the player with the most created chances (3), the most Expected Goals (0.39 xG), the most touches in the opposition box (8) and the most successful dribbles (3). Display.

[INST] Write an Opta-style tweet about the following: Thomas Tuchel has established himself as one of the most successful managers in UEFA Champions League history, boasting the third-highest win percentage (59.7%) among those who have overseen 50 or more games in the tournament.[/INST]3 - Among managers to take charge of 50+ games in the UEFA Champions League, Thomas Tuchel has the third-highest win percentage in the tournament's history (59.7%). Elite.

[INST] Write an Opta-style tweet about the following: Hugo Bueno heeft een vliegende start gemaakt bij @Feyenoord. In zijn Eredivisie-debuut gaf hij al na vier minuten een assist. Dit is de op één na snelste assist voor een debutant bij Feyenoord deze eeuw, alleen overtroffen door Cyriel Dessers. Bueno's snelle entrada in de Nederlandse competitie belooft veel voor zijn toekomst bij de Rotterdamse club.[/INST]4 - Hugo Bueno provided an assist within four minutes after his Eredivisie debut, the second fastest for a @Feyenoord player this century (after Cyriel Dessers). Entrada.

[INST] Write an Opta-style tweet about the following: Sébastien Pocognoli's managerial career at Union Saint-Gilloise got off to a dream start. In his first-ever competitive game as a professional team manager, he led the team to Belgian Super Cup victory at the age of 36 years and 347 days, becoming the youngest manager to achieve this feat.[/INST]36y347d - In his first-ever competitive game as manager of a professional team, @UnionStGilloise's Sébastien Pocognoli became the youngest manager to ever win the Belgian Super Cup (36 years and 347 days). Dream.

[INST] Write an Opta-style tweet about the following: Willem II (@WillemII) has unearthed a gem in Cisse Sandra. The young Belgian forward has written his name into the Eredivisie (@eredivisie) history books by becoming the youngest player from his country to score a brace in a single match in over a decade. At just 20 years and 280 days old, Sandra's achievement is the most notable for a Belgian since Zakaria Bakkali's performance for PSV back in August 2013, when Bakkali was an even younger 17 years and 196 days old.[/INST]20y280d - @WillemII's Cisse Sandra is the youngest Belgian with two goals in a single @eredivisie game (20 years and 280 days) since Zakaria Bakkali for PSV in August 2013 (17 years and 196 days). Decissive.

[INST] Write an Opta-style tweet about the following: In zijn 27ste wedstrijd voor @AFCAjax heeft Mika Godts eindelijk zijn eerste doelpunt voor de club gescoord. Met deze mijlpaal wordt hij de eerste Belgische doelpuntenmaker voor Ajax sinds Toby Alderweireld in maart 2013. Dit sacrosancte moment markeert hopelijk het begin van meer scorende optredens van de jonge Belg.[/INST]1 - In what was his 27th game for @AFCAjax, Mika Godts scored his first goal for the club, becoming the first Belgian goal scorer for Ajax since Toby Alderweireld in March 2013. Sacrosanct.

[INST] Write an Opta-style tweet about the following: FC Volendam's (@fcvolendam) striker Henk Veerman is currently enjoying a phenomenal run of form in away matches. He has managed to find the back of the net in seven consecutive Eerste Divisie (@1e_Divisie) away games, a streak that hasn't been seen in the league for over a decade. The last player to achieve such an impressive away scoring run was Jeremy Bokila, who scored in seven straight away games for Sparta Rotterdam between October 2011 and March 2012.[/INST]7 - @fcvolendam's Henk Veerman is the first player to find the net in seven consecutive @1e_Divisie away games since Jeremy Bokila for Sparta Rotterdam in October 2011-March 2012 (7). Skipper.

[INST] Write an Opta-style tweet about the following: De IJslandse international Kolbeinn Finnsson heeft zich onderscheiden in de Deense Superliga. Als verdediger van Lyngby BK creëerde hij maar liefst 48 kansen in het afgelopen seizoen. Slechts twee spelers in de hele competitie wisten meer kansen te creëren, wat de aandacht heeft getrokken van veel clubs die op zoek zijn naar creatieve verdedigers.[/INST]48 - Iceland international Kolbeinn Finnsson created 48 chances in the Superliga last season, only two players managed to create more than the Lyngby BK defender. Eyed.

[INST] Write an Opta-style tweet about the following: Calvin Stengs heeft een persoonlijk record gebroken in de Eredivisie. Voor het eerst in zijn carrière was hij direct betrokken bij drie doelpunten in één Eredivisie-wedstrijd, met 1 doelpunt en 2 assists. Deze prestatie markeert een indrukwekkende terugkeer voor Stengs en benadrukt zijn groeiende invloed op het spel.[/INST]3 - For the first time in his career, Calvin Stengs was directly involved in three goals within a single Eredivisie game (1 goal, 2 assists). [INST] Write an Opta-style tweet about the following: In a dramatic EURO 2024 final, Cole Palmer's equalizer as a substitute echoed Sylvain Wiltord's heroics for France in EURO 2000. Both players' goals set the stage for their teams' eventual victories.[/INST]2000 - Cole Palmer is the first substitute to score an equalising goal in a European Championship final since Sylvain Wiltord at EURO 2000 for France, who then went on to win 2-1. [INST] Write an Opta-style tweet about the following: Remko Pasveer heeft geschiedenis geschreven bij @AFCAjax. Op 40 jaar en 277 dagen oud is hij de eerste veertigplusser ooit die een @eredivisie-wedstrijd speelt voor de Amsterdamse club.[/INST]40 - Remko Pasveer (40 years and 277 days) is the first 40-year-old to ever play an @eredivisie match for @AFCAjax. [INST] Write an Opta-style tweet about the following: Oliver Baumann has set a new record in German football history. At the ripe age of 34 years and 131 days, he became the oldest goalkeeper ever to make his debut for the German national team (DFB). This late bloom isn't just notable for goalkeepers - Baumann is the second-oldest DFB debutant in the post-war era, regardless of position. Only Matthias Mauritz was older when he first donned the national team jersey.[/INST]34y, 131d - Aged 34 years and 131 days, Oliver Baumann is the second-oldest DFB debutant (after Matthias Mauritz) in the post-war era and the oldest goalkeeper to make his debut in DFB history. Latecomer.

[INST] Write an Opta-style tweet about the following: Borna Sosa van @AFCAjax heeft zich ontpopt tot een assist-machine. [INST] Write an Opta-style tweet about the following: @AFCAjax heeft een indrukwekkende reeks neergezet tegen Poolse tegenstanders in Europese competities. The last player to match this impressive run was Jeremy Bokila, who scored in seven straight away games for Sparta Rotterdam between October 2011 and March 2012.[/INST]7 - @fcvolendam's Henk Veerman is the first player to find the net in seven consecutive @1e_Divisie away games since Jeremy Bokila for Sparta Rotterdam in October 2011-March 2012 (7). [INST] Write an Opta-style tweet about the following: Michel Vlap's free-kick goal for FC Twente marked a historic moment, being the club's first direct free-kick score in European football since Dusan Tadic's strike against Helsingborgs in 2012.[/INST]2012 - Michel Vlap scored @fctwente's first direct free kick goal in European football since Dusan Tadic against Helsingborgs on 6 June 2012. [INST] Write an Opta-style tweet about the following: Jorrel Hato has made history for the Dutch national team, known as @OnsOranje, by becoming one of the youngest players to start a match this century. At just 18 years and 221 days old, Hato is the third-youngest starter for the Netherlands since 2000. Only two players have beaten this record: Matthijs de Ligt, who was a mere 17 years and 225 days old at his first start, and Jetro Willems, who was 18 years and 57 days old. This early start for Hato signals a promising future for the young talent.[/INST]18 - Only Matthijs de Ligt (17 year and 225 days) and Jetro Willems (18 years, 57 days) were younger at their first start for @OnsOranje this century than Jorrel Hato (18 years, 221 days). [INST] Write an Opta-style tweet about the following: England have written an unwanted chapter in UEFA European Championship history. They've become the first nation to suffer defeat in consecutive finals, a testament to their ability to reach the climax of the tournament but also a reflection of their struggles to clinch the ultimate prize.[/INST]2 - England have become the first nation in UEFA European Championship history to lose consecutive finals. [INST] Write an Opta-style tweet about the following: The Netherlands national team had a particularly unproductive first half in their recent match. This combination of stats paints a picture of a strikingly toothless Dutch attack in the opening period.[/INST]0 – The Netherlands have failed to attempt a single shot in a first half of a game for the first time since June 2019 (v Portugal) and recorded just one touch in the opposition box before half-time for the first time since August 2017 (v France). [INST] Write an Opta-style tweet about the following: Felice Mazzu has reached a significant milestone in his managerial career in the Belgian Pro League (@ProLeagueBE). This wealth of experience makes Mazzu one of the most seasoned coaches in Belgian football.[/INST]356 - Felice Mazzu already managed 356 @ProLeagueBE matches, just eight fewer than the next two most experienced current top-flight managers combined (364 - Wouter Vrancken 191 and Ivan Leko 173).
